title: Chapter 1
Description:
The queen of heart from 'Alice in Wonderland' got out of her book. You have to control her before she gets out of the library and cut everybody's head of! She's a blind fury! 
 What do you decide to do to beat her?
Book: The gardians of the Bookshelves' Adventure

0.Name: You get her book to see how to beat her

1.Name: You show her her own reflection
